name: Batch-game-framework
tagline: A simple framework for creating games and other scripts in Batch. It uses a launcher that can download Batch and PowerShell scripts from a webpage.
body:
# Batch Game Framework
A simple framework for creating games and other scripts in Batch. It uses a launcher that can download Batch and PowerShell scripts from a webpage.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
